text: Giacomo Pontoriero (February 16, 1958 - October 7, 2024), better known as Jack Ponti, was an American musician, songwriter, record producer, manager, label executive, and consultant. Category:1958 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American songwriters Category:American guitarists Category:American rock guitarists Category:American chief executives Category:People from New Jersey Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:20th-century American musicians
title: Jack Ponti
